name: Logic Box - Drop Stack In Maze
name_original: Logic Box - Drop Stack In Maze
description:
Logic Box is an addictive and easy to learn, but the game requires sharp mind and brain control.

PURE LOGIC
• This game gives you a whole new experience and challenges you to think about every move.
• Only the perfect plan will give you the best result. Can you break the magical 100K points?

MOVE, SPIN & DROP
• Fill the game board with a color boxes and connect the same colors together.
• Connect at least three boxes with a same color or try to make a massive combo and clear all the boxes from game board.
• You can move and spin the square box and then drop this on perfect position to the game board.

CONTROLS
• Easy one-touch control is very fun and simple to play with one hand. Swipe left or right to move the box, swipe up or down to rotate the box and double-click to drop the box!

PLAY FOR FREE OR PLAY FOR REAL MONEY
• You can play the game completely FREE without annoying ads or you can challenge yourself with real money.

TOURNAMENTS
• Includes fantastic tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes. (Where available!).
• Other places you can still play in multiplayer competitions with FREE virtual currency. (This don't cost nothing)

BASIC FEATURES:
• Match the colors.
• Move the box left or right. (Swipe left or right)
• Spin the box. (Swipe up or down)
• Drop the box (Double click).
• Connect as many colors at once or sequentially.
• Simple and fun one touch control.
• Play Skillz Multiplayer Tournaments Against Other Users (Skillz.com)
• Play for FREE or play with real money. (Where available!)

STRATEGY ELEMENTS!
• You have 3 minutes for each match to see how many points you can get.
• Connect at least 3 boxes together with the same color.
• Crush multiple boxes at same time.
• Crush multiple colors at same time.
• Crush multiple colors sequentially.
• Without any bonuses you can not win, so make only the smart moves.

PLAY AGAINST REAL PLAYER!
• Play Head to Head game with other players or in large, multiplayer tournaments.
• In head to head games both players trying to solve same puzzle and player who finished with the most points win!
• Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play with virtual currency.
• Challenge people around the world with Skillz. Complete with leaderboards, trophies and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing.
